1.title: A Twist of Fate
1.prose: You wake up with a headache. Something is wrong and it is not the usual. Although you do remember having a drink, the night took a turn before you could finish the bottle.
1.endPrompt: What do you want to try?

signpost.teaser: Go back to sleep.  Maybe this will all go away.
Ring your friend, and get his take on what happened.
